attributes.action: Relax the rules on masks for socially distanced wedding guests
attributes.additional_details:
The wedding industry is worth £10bn/yr and yet is disproportionately penalised in current regulations. One example is the use of masks - currently families can celebrate in a restaurant without masks, but if sat in a church, masks must be worn. The govt has said that 2m is safe,1m requires extra precautions: therefore guests who sit 2m apart shouldn’t need masks. 
Thousands have already rescheduled their day; this restriction means many are delaying further, preventing the industry recovering.
attributes.background: Please allow guests to attend weddings without wearing masks, as long as they remain 2m apart.
